summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 31st Avenue South from Washington Street to King Street; King Street, from 32nd Avenue South to a point 100 feet west of the west margin of 31st Avenue South; all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage,; by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon and constructing concrete stairways and concrete bulkheads; provided that the Park Board shall pay one half of the entire cost of this improvement, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2090 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
